loading_sdk package

Submodules

loading_sdk.api module

class loading_sdk.api.LoadingApiClient(email=None, password=None)

Bases: object

A client that allows python apps to easily communicate with the loading forums web api.

Some methods can be used anonymously, while others require the client to be authenticated with user credentials.

Parameters

  • email (str) – users email address (optional)

  • password (str) – users password (optional)

create_post(thread_id, message)

Create new post in a thread

Parameters

  • thread_id (str) – Unique thread id

  • message (str) – Text that can be formatted with markdown that will be posted in the thread

Return type

dict

create_thread(title, message, category_name, post_type=None)

Create new thread in one of the forum categories

Parameters

  • title (str) – Thread title

  • message (str) – Thread body that can be formatted with markdown

  • category_name (str) – Forum category. Can be either “games” or “other”.

  • post_type – Creates a “regular” thread by the default. (optional)

Return type

dict

edit_post(post_id, message)

Edit existing post in a thread

Parameters

  • post_id (str) – Unique post id

  • message (str) – New text, that can be formatted with markdown, that will replace the old message

Return type

dict

edit_thread(thread_id, message)

Edit existing thread

Parameters

  • thread_id (str) – Unique thread id

  • message (str) – New text, that can be formatted with markdown, that will replace the old message

Return type

dict

get_editorials(page=None, post_type=None, sort=None)

Retruns threads from a specific page in the texts category

Parameters

  • page (int) – Texts forum page (optional)

  • post_type (str) – Articles can be of post_type: “review”, “opinion”, “update”, “podcast”, or “conversation” (optional)

  • sort (str) – Sort the returned threads by date by the default, but if “title” is used as a parameter it’s sorted by thread title instead. (optional)

Return type

dict

get_games(page=None)

Retruns threads from a specific page in the game category

Parameters

page (int) – Game forum page

Return type

dict

get_other(page=None)

Retruns threads from a specific page in the other category

Parameters

page (int) – Other forum page

Return type

dict

get_post(post_id)

Returns a specific post

Parameters

post_id (str) – unique post id

Return type

dict

get_profile()

Returns authenticated users profile data

Return type

dict

get_thread(thread_id, page=None)

Returns all posts on a specific page from a specific thread

Parameters

  • thread_id (str) – unique thread_id

  • page (int) – thread page (optional)

Return type

dict

search(query)

Returns posts that matches the query

Parameters

query (str) – Search query

Return type

dict

Module contents

class loading_sdk.LoadingApiClient(email=None, password=None)

Bases: object

A client that allows python apps to easily communicate with the loading forums web api.

Some methods can be used anonymously, while others require the client to be authenticated with user credentials.

Parameters

  • email (str) – users email address (optional)

  • password (str) – users password (optional)
